CustomField.formula: Approved_Advance_Amount_Calc__c - Origination_Fee__c - Advance_Fee__c - IF(Advance__r.Appraisal_Fee_Netted__c,BPO_Appraisal_Fee__c,0) - Doc_Prep_Fee__c - BlackSquare_Fee__c - Daily_Interest_Rate_Total__c - Inspection_Fee__c - IF(Advance__r.Report_Fees_Netted__c,Report_Fee_Total__c,0)
CustomField.label: Net Funding
